name: Fix N'Replace
subtitle: Organizing repair cafés for a sustainable future
description: Fix N'Replace is a community-driven association that organizes repair cafés to promote sustainability and reduce waste. Volunteers help participants fix broken items, share knowledge, and build a stronger community.

events.name: Monthly Repair Café
events.description: A monthly gathering where volunteers and participants work together to fix broken items, from electronics to furniture.

events.name: Sustainability Workshop
events.description: A workshop on reducing waste and extending the lifespan of household items.
